snippet.title: Captain Wayne: Vacation Desperation - Official Gameplay Trailer | The MIX Next August 2023
snippet.description:
What begins as a silly scene quickly turns into chaotic, brutal action in this gameplay trailer for Captain Wayne: Vacation Desperation, an upcoming bloody, fast-action Retro Shooter about the titular Captain Wayne. 


As Wayne, you’re equipped with a double-barreled shotgun for an arm, countless explosives, and a bad attitude. It’s up to you to go toe-to-toe with the most ruthless mercenaries in all the seven-and-a-half seas, the Killer Whales, while laying waste to Orca Isle in your conquest to rob the rich to feed the badass.


Captain Wayne: Vacation Desperation will be available on PC.
